titlepage.titleproper: Inventory of the Susannah Nourse Sawyer Autograph Album, 1836-1841
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center Mss. Acc. 2008.118
titlepage.publisher: Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Autograph diary of Susannah Nourse who was a student at Bolton Seminary in Brooklyn, New York. Most entries are poems with some prose. Many entries are by Nourse's family. A list of autographs is included with the diary.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Susannah Nourse Sawyer Autograph Album, Special Collection Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 00/00/2008.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Student at Bolton Seminary, Brooklyn, New York.  Married surname probably Sawyer. Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Susannah Nourse.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Autograph diary of Susannah Nourse who was a student at Bolton Seminary in Brooklyn, New York. Most entries are poems with some prose. Many entries are by Nourse's family. A list of autographs is included with the diary.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
